name: Creature ue4 plugin with editor
tagline: This is the Creature Plugin for UE4 with State Machine System and an Editor.
body:
### Creature Plugin for UE4 with State Machine/Editor.
This is a customed Creature Plugin which contained a state machine system with editor.
![Showcase](http://img-storage.qiniudn.com/15-9-17/32673098.jpg)

### Creature and Creature Runtime Plugin
The Creature Plugin is created by kestrelm. You can find the source version of creature in https://github.com/kestrelm/Creature_UE4 .And you the main page of creature is ture.kestrelmoon.com

### Authors and Contributors
I write the Creature Editor module. And also add some files into Creature Plugin

### Support or Contact
You can write emails to me : 1441842473@qq.com
You can also follow me on twitter @ldl19691031
